title: r/Relationships My dog saved me from a MURDERER, now my family wants to put her down!
description:
r/Relationships_Advice In today's episode, OP is plagued by a stalker who harasses her at every turn. She eventually gets fed up and buys a huge dog for protection. Well, one night the stalker breaks into OP's house, and her dog viciously attacks the intruder and saves OP's life! After the incident, OP's family thinks that the dog is a dangerous animal that should be put to sleep. What should OP do? If you like this podcast and want to see more, follow my podcast for more daily Reddit content!
